modName: Guns and Tools Sold With Mods
modShortDescription: Merchants around the world now sell weapons and tools with mods installed on them.
modDescription:
Merchants around the world now sell weapons and [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) with mods installed on them.

The mod is still tied at the level of the player, his GS, as well as learned skills. At the first levels, you will not find [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) of “6 quality” with the most top mods.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Okamich/FallOFBabylon-A19/tree/main/Fob_Traders)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22025-okami-modlets-fall-of-babylon/).

**Credits:** [Okami](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/okami/)
